body.name: Furnulem Vertical Dresser 3-Tier Wood Shelf Tall Fabric Storage Tower with 4 Drawers Black Closet Organizer Unit for Bedroom,Living Room,Hallway,Nursery(Black Oak)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 38 mins
features: 【3Tier Shelves & 4 Drawers Design】This open shelves dresser is designed with 3 open shelves and 4 fabric drawers for large capacity and space saving. Easily collect and display your favorite photos, books, collectibles and a variety of plants and decorations on the shelves and store your intimate items in the bottom drawers.

【Exquisite Craftsmanship】The tall black dresser tower is made of steel and wood construction. Each tier storage rack is scratch-resistant, wear-resistant, and can hold up to 50 lbs. Foldable fabric drawers(NOT WOOD) are lightweight and easy to pull out and push in.

【Versatile Usage Display Shelf】More than a dresser. Whether it's used as a bookcase in your living room, standing next to your computer desk, or even a plant ladder shelf stand on your balcony, or as a bakers rack in your kitchen, this bookcase is a great choice. Its minimalist style makes it fit nicely into its environment and adds an extra industrial style to your home decor.

【Structural Safety Dresser】The 4 adjustable feet are designed to ensure the stability of the white chest of drawers and prevent it from swaying. It also provides 2 anti-tip kits to prevent tipping and injury, ensuring the safety of your family.

【Easy Assembly】The package contains all the accessories and hardware kits as well as the instructions that are shipped with this product. The instruction manual is easy to understand with clear step-by-step and logical illustrations and the user only needs to follow the steps to complete the installation with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to home office
reviews.reviewText: I’d give this 4 1/2 star if that was an option. I needed a bookshelf for my office but wanted some storage as well. This piece looks amazing and I’m just waiting for it to be available in another color to but more for my husband’s office.It was petty simple to set up, but one support piece wasn’t sized correctly and took quite a bit of effort and a mallet to get it together. I doubt I’ll ever be able to get it apart, but it’s light and easy to move, so I am not concerned about that.Because of the open sides, I had to get bookends to hold books in place, but it’s a nice compliment to the decor and not overpowering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So this item is a pain in the ass to assemble however the instructions are easy. It’s sturdy but the metal pieces are hard to connect, while it should be a quick put together, one of the kegs wouldn’t go in no matter how much I tried until I put it together backwards. Instructions say make sure all hole parts on all 3 legs are the same but it just wouldn’t go in, wouldn’t connect. I tried it backwards and it went in just fine, but now one the little backs is in the front. While it comes with the tool you need to put it together, it’s very small & painful, had I not lost our entire home to a fire, I would of used my own tool, so save yourself the stress & pain & be sure to use your own.I would actually purchase it again, my daughter loves it, it looks nice. Just be sure to have the right screw drivers & I’ll try again tomorrow to take it apart & retry the correct way

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wasn’t hard to put together. Took me about 2 hours alone and that’s because I realized toward the end that I had messed something up in the beginning. The small screws were annoying because there was no thread for the screw to go into. I’d recommend drilling them in if you have one handy. The pieces don’t go perfectly together so you have to do a bit of wiggling. I love the finished product and it feels sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, came with all the tools you need, very sturdy, love the leather fronts on the drawers, drawers seem to be pretty sturdy for fabric drawers, very pleased with this product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars screws don’t work
reviews.reviewText: there’s a reason this is so cheap. it was so difficult to build when it didn’t need to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got it to put all my daughter toys one place. It's perfect. I wish it was a little taller but it's okay for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unable to put together or return
reviews.reviewText: I was sent two of the same side frame, so the “back” L shape angle, to stop the bins from sliding out, is not at the back for both sides of the frame. So you have the back side on the back and front, preventing the bins from being put in and usable. Attempted to request a replacement of the one side but was only give the return option, & received no response & no option to actually process a return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent little dresser
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a good product. It feels sturdy and was easy to put together. I think it took me about 30min with the crappy tools they give you. Recommend using your own if you have them. The size is smaller than what I was anticipating but it still works for the intended purpose. I love the shelves and drawer combo. I don't like that the top drawers have gaps (seen in pic). But it's out holding socks and undies in my closet really so not a huge deal. If it was a main part of my furniture I would be more upset by it. Overall happy with my purchase.
